articles.title: Reception given at Polish embassy
articles.content:
Reception given at Polish embassy 
    Pyongyang, November 12 (KCNA) -- Wojciech Kaluza, Polish Ambassador to the DPRK, hosted a reception at the embassy Monday evening on the occasion of the Day of Independence of Poland.
 Present on invitation were vice-Minister of Foreign Affairs Choe Su Hon, vice-Minister of Foreign Trade Kim Yong Jae, vice-chairwoman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries Hong Son Ok, other officials concerned and foreign diplomatic envoys and other diplomats here.    
 Speeches were made there.

articles.content:
Executive director of WFP here
    Pyongyang, November 12 (KCNA) -- James T. Morris, executive director of the World Food Program, and his party arrived in Pyongyang today.
 They were greeted at the airport by Choe Su Hon, vice-Minister of Foreign Affairs, and other officials concerned.
